name: ZomerTech
tagline: We Turn Your Ideas into Reality
description:
ZomerTech is a new IT company offering custom software solutions that will give our clients a competitive advantage. We work together with our customers to concretize their ideas and then design and build the chosen solution at superior standards of quality.
Our team achieves a healthy mix of agility and reliability. We are passionate about tackling problems involving algorithm optimization, intelligent data processing and data analysis. We want to win just as you do and this drives us to solve deep problems.
We are happy to use both established and new technologies to best accommodate customer needs. Here are some of the technologies we are most familiar with: java, c/c++, android, scala, javascript, angular, react native, css, html, haskell, python, php, hadoop, mySQL, redis, AWS.
We're an agile team of two passionate software engineers. We have a strong technical background in computer science (national and international olympiads in informatics) and software industry experience (worked for Facebook, Twitter, Amazon in Silicon Valley, Seattle, London and Romania).
